name: SpookyTown CountDown
description:
A Witch and her cat Nutmeg are in serious trouble after a nauseous brew blew up their house! Help them restore their home just in time for Halloween with help from the O'lantern Brothers!

--ABOUT--

SpookyTown CountDown is an experimental game focusing on mini games for every interaction instead of the usual single button presses.

--CONTROLS--

WASD - Movement

E - To interact when '!' appears above your head.

i - Open Inventory.

M - Open Map.

Mouse (Drag and Drop) - Left Click to grab intractables, Left Click again to drop them and hold Right Click to "Brush" them around.

SPACEBAR - Cycle through the game's extensive sound track by Luke Spine.

--CREDITS--

Game Design, Sound and Music - Luke Spine

Game Design, Direction and Programming - Claudio Micieli

Art (Environments and Characters) - Louise Kruse

Art (House Exteriors and Intractables) - CaseyScreamsBack

Thank you for playing our Demo!  We hope you enjoyed and are excited for whats to come!
